summary: Defines inâ€‘memory model objects and a backend for the Moto mock implementation of AWS Resilience Hub, handling applications, their components, versions, resources, resiliency policies, pagination and tagging.
business_intent: Enables developers to test and develop against the Resilience Hub API without contacting real AWS services by providing a fully functional mock backend that mimics creation, retrieval, listing, publishing and tagging of Resilience Hub entities.
